title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 260.2 - Nature of allowances
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7 ยง 260.2 - Nature of allowances

State Regulations

Good behavior allowances are in the nature of a privilege
to be earned by the inmate and no inmate has the right to demand or to require
that any good behavior allowance be granted to him. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 7
ยง
260.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
